description:
A productivity add-in for Microsoft PowerPoint, Excel and Word.

Power-user is a productivity add-in for Microsoft PowerPoint, Excel and Word. It brings dozens of advanced features to save time and deliver attractive presentations:
- Access thousands of templates, icons, flags, maps, charts, pictures, logos and more from the Library
- Create robust links between Excel and PowerPoint to automate reports
- Clean your presentation from common mistakes in 1 click
- Create agenda pages automatically
- Easily align and manipulate shapes
- Clean Excel data and formula
- And a lot more!
- [AI Assistant] Apply right to left when translating into relevant languages
- [Agenda] Set a default number when a subsection is added, and no number type is defined for the level
- [Charts] Add the support of Gantt diagram in Word
- [Charts] Minor issues fixed
- [Links] Fixed range link size after update
- [Links] Fixed range link update when the shape to update is a part of a group shape
- [Links] Fix Excel range export using Apose when the font is from Aptos family
- [Cleaner] Minor fixes
- [New] admins can define custom keyboard shortcuts for their entire organizaiton
- Add offline license domain in logs
- Multiple bug fixes
